alert.note: Alert for Belmont; Carroll; Coshocton; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 4:19PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT THE AREA THROUGH 500 PM EDT... At 418 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Waynesburg to near Wilmot to near Wooster. Movement was southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wheeling, Steubenville, New Philadelphia, Dover, Martins Ferry, Uhrichsville, St. Clairsville, Cadiz, Carrollton, Warwood, Wellsburg, West Liberty, Clearview, Valley Grove, Freeport, Wintersville, Newcomerstown, Dennison, Strasburg, and Sugarcreek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 209 and 225. Interstate 70 in West Virginia between mile markers 0 and 2. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 62 and 94. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Belmont; Carroll; Coshocton; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Tuscarawas
